channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:44 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:44 Air alarm to the Kherson region follow the following messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
